summary:
Novak The Slayer is a 2017 book i wrote based on my D&D character of the same name, distributed in book stores soon. character It is the 3rd installment in character from my book he is in, the Winking Skeever
my other book follower is Mary of Wolfengard at https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88076 who is novak's younger sister,,
descriptionHtml:
Novak The Slayer is a 2017 book  i wrote  based on my D&D character of the same name, distributed in book stores soon. character It is the fourth installment in character from my book he is in, the Winking Skeever
